info.name: Cash-Flow
info.description:
Welcome to Tinkâ€™s Postman collection for Cash-Flow.

For detailed information on how to use Cash-Flow, visit [API docs page for this service](https://docs.tink.com/api#finance-management/cash-flow).

The documentation in this Postman collection shows how you get your Tink variables and enter them in Postman to be able to use this collection.

Prerequisites:

*   Generated User
*   Accounts created and linked to a user
*   (Optional) Some transactions ingested for accounts
    

In Postman, go to the **Variables** tab, which should be the one with a green dot next to it.

Make sure that you enter all of your variables in the **CURRENT VALUE** column.

Enter the `bearer_token` value that you have generated. It's an authentication token generated for user not for app.

There is no need to change `ApiUrl` unless you want to use non-production environments.

exec: pm.test("get cash flow summaries should return HTTP 200", function() {

variable.description: one of: DAILY, WEEKLY, MONTHLY, YEARLY
